Prices are subject to change‚ and are up to date as of July 15‚ 2008.      Replacement for Lost ID    $20     Passport Photos  2 for $10    Immigration Photos  2 for $10    Color Photos  2 for $5    International ISIC Card  $30 ($25 when patron provides own photos)     The $20 fee for a replacement card will be waived if your card is older than one year and shows visible signs of wear due to general use. Cards which have been visibly altered (i.e. punching holes‚ bent‚ warped by the sun) will not be eligible for the fee waiver. ID Center staff will make the final decision on fee waivers.
